name: NetLog_PrepData
description: Read in the network logs from inside the firewall.  Ahmed recently revised it (4/19/2016), to support *.csv input into Kafka

name: NetLog_IntrusDet_3.1
tags: R, cluster, PMML, Kamanja, HBase, Tom, BankD
description: This is Greg's network intrusion detection model.  Kmeans clusters per application are trained in R and exported via PMML.  Logs reflecting behavior far from any cluster can be considered for review.  This program outputs only the 0 to 3% of the records to consider for alerting.

name: NetLog_PostProcessing
description: Ahmed is loading the 0-3% of alert records from the previous job to the Security Operations Center (SOC) application, along with investigation reasons.

name: WebLog_BotnetDet
description: Extract unusual URL's from web logs that are 1) long and strange or 2) a few people keep going to, even though it is unresolved.

name: webLog_accTakeover_prep
description: Pull weblogs of employees behavior on SaaS applications outside the firewall.

name: webLog_accTakeover_detet_2.8
tags: R, cluster, PMML, Kamanja, HBase, Greg
description: Create one set of clusters of normal behavior on the mix of apps and sections of apps they use.  Outlier behavior is of concern.

name: webLog_accTakeover_post
description: Route the alerts to the internal SOC application for tracking employee behavior.
